name: VG Wort – Report texts (automatically) online
author: CrayssnLabs

sections.description: This plugin analyses all published pages according to the criteria of the VG Wort and integrates a data protection compliant pixel counter to anonymously count the number of hits on the texts. These texts are automatically reported to the VG Wort as soon as a certain number has been reached.
sections.installation:
1. Upload cl-vg-wort.zip through the WordPress ‘Plugins’ area to install the plugin
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Set the api key through the plugin options page
